entity.name: ImageMagick
entity.description: ImageMagick® is a free, open-source software suite, used for editing and manipulating digital images. It can be used to create, edit, compose, or convert bitmap images, and supports a wide range of file formats, including JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, and Ultra HDR.

projects.name: ImageMagick
projects.description: ImageMagick® is a free, open-source software suite, used for editing and manipulating digital images. It can be used to create, edit, compose, or convert bitmap images, and supports a wide range of file formats, including JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, and Ultra HDR.

channels.description: Payments up to $12,000 USD per month can be made via Github Sponsors.

plans.name: Developer compensation
plans.description: This compensate the developers working part-time on the project.
